name: Nth Space
description:
Travel between dimensions with this 2D/3D hybrid puzzler taking inspiration from games like Portal and Antichamber. Explore euclidean space like never before.

Possible extensions: 4D (perhaps 4D shadows in 3D space) or non-Euclidean space, change axis that 2D is created on, give player choice what objects can travel across dimensions (or make only objects being held by player able to cross dimensions), let player pick which wall the 2D orientation is based from.

Music is made by my brother, everything else is my own work (some free sound effects used + tesseract gif).

Recommend playing in fullscreen

Controls:

Movement: awsd + mouse

2: Enter second dimension

3: Enter third dimension

E: Interact/Pickup
